data.eml:eml: A new species of Arctodiamesa Makarchenko (Diptera: Chironomidae: Diamesinae) from the Russian Far East, with a key to known species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Makarchenko, Eugenyi A. (2005): A new species of Arctodiamesa Makarchenko (Diptera: Chironomidae: Diamesinae) from the Russian Far East, with a key to known species of the genus. Zootaxa 1084: 59-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170449
